review: >Got it's key>Installed it>Opened>Bugged my whole PC, for some reason randomized my monitor configuration and i wasn't able to click anything of the game>Tried to open it again today>Missing exe.>Verify Game Cache>134 files, or the entire game>Steam showed me that it was installed.100/1 a zero bugged and went into the other side, but wellWould play 'Random Monitor Config Simulator and Mouse Disabler Simulator 2012 b.C' again
La verdad es que este juego es muy entretenido para jugarlo con amigos, porque si andás solo, o te matan mucho, o te morís o te aburrís. En resumen: Está muy bueno y se los recomiendo.
You wanna a full-o-bugs game? This is perfect for you. An update was released: 560 bugs released, 1 fixed.10/10 would use flamethrower through a wall again.
What the hell are you reading this?! Go and download the DLC! (If you already own HL2)
